Deathifier - If you are working on the new scenario editor, what parts 
are you on working?  If you are working on anything in particular, 
would it be possible to work making a way to export Gladiator maps to 
a graphics format?


Note, I have been playing around with my program making it move items 
on the map.  I almost had "The Brag" reworked until I discovered I 
somehow corrupted the scenario file.  Damn it, I had to start all over 
 fixing the location of objects.  When I do get done with that part, 
I'll post my code for all the manipulation I did to adjust "The Brag" 
to its new map.  Hopefully, the map should be agreeable with more 
people.  I, also, am going to slip in a topic sometime about 
explosions before we hit the Scenario Trivia Contest week.


As soon as I get through fixing my maps, I am going to start working 
on adding a sort feature to my program.

So far the sort I am thinking about is the following:

1)Team Number (except for Weapons, Treasure, and FX orders)
2)Startup Player Position for that team (if Applicable)
3)Living Families
4)Generator Families
5)Doors for that team
6)Treasures, Weapons, and FX orders sorted by Order number then Family 
number
